name: Codefaktory.com
overview:
Code Faktory: Code for Creativity, is a professional fast paced development company, with 5 different developing centers. Each of our centers are dedicated to specific technologies that pertain to that center. These centers house more than 200 coders that each bring their own different creativity and experience.

Together our team has successfully completed over 500 projects for various clients around the world. You can hire a specific developer of your choice or even hire us as a company for all of your web development needs. If you can dream it, our team will certainly make it happen.With experience in most any real world web development situations, our team is always thinking outside of the box to come with solutions to a wide array of projects.

Main Task of CodeFaktory:

Fix Cost Fix Time Delivery Dedicated Developer Work On Client Demand

Our developers create and publish the most user-friendly software products, software, they will even design a custom toolbar for you. Our team is hard at work every day and night developing both PHP and HTML5 scripts to give you the ability to take charge of your own website. Code Faktory understands how complicating and frustrating it can be for business owners and professionals to worry about their online presence, as you already have enough on your plate.
